metadata.description: Complete database export from Product Feature Readiness Database

product_features.name: Autonomous Port Operations
product_features.description: Complete autonomous vehicle operations for port terminal environments
product_features.label: PF-PORT-1.0
product_features.tmos: Operate autonomously in port environment with 99.9% safety and 95% efficiency

product_features.name: Advanced Port Operations System
product_features.description: Updated: Comprehensive autonomous vehicle system with enhanced safety features
product_features.label: PF-PORT-2.0
product_features.tmos: Complete 1000 autonomous port operations with 99.9% safety record and 95% efficiency

capabilities.name: Port Navigation
capabilities.success_criteria: Navigate port layout with 99% accuracy and optimal path selection
capabilities.tmos: Efficient navigation through complex port environments

capabilities.name: Container Handling Coordination
capabilities.success_criteria: Coordinate with port equipment for safe container operations
capabilities.tmos: Seamless integration with port handling equipment

capabilities.name: Safety Monitoring
capabilities.success_criteria: Detect and respond to safety hazards within 2 seconds
capabilities.tmos: Proactive safety monitoring and hazard response

capabilities.name: Advanced Navigation and Positioning
capabilities.success_criteria: Updated: Navigate complex port layout with 99.5% accuracy using enhanced GPS and visual SLAM
capabilities.tmos: Reliable navigation capability for all port environments

capabilities.name: Safety and Risk Management
capabilities.success_criteria: Detect and respond to safety hazards within 500ms with 99.9% accuracy
capabilities.tmos: Proactive safety monitoring and hazard response in port environment

technical_functions.name: GPS/IMU Navigation System
technical_functions.description: High-precision navigation using GPS and inertial measurement

technical_functions.name: Port Layout Mapping
technical_functions.description: Real-time mapping and localization within port environment
technical_functions.success_criteria: Maintain accurate position in GPS-denied areas

technical_functions.name: Equipment Communication Interface
technical_functions.description: Communication system for coordinating with port equipment

technical_functions.name: Collision Avoidance System
technical_functions.description: Active collision avoidance with multiple sensor types
technical_functions.success_criteria: Detect obstacles and humans within 50m range

technical_functions.name: Emergency Stop System
technical_functions.description: Fail-safe emergency stop with multiple redundancy
technical_functions.success_criteria: Stop vehicle within 5 meters at maximum speed

technical_functions.name: GPS/IMU Integration
technical_functions.description: Updated: Enhanced GPS/IMU integration with improved accuracy near metal structures
technical_functions.success_criteria: Provide position accuracy within 10cm in open areas and 50cm near metal structures

technical_functions.name: Visual SLAM System
technical_functions.description: Simultaneous Localization and Mapping using computer vision for GPS-denied environments
technical_functions.success_criteria: Maintain accurate position in GPS-denied areas for up to 5 minutes
technical_functions.tmos: Backup navigation system for challenging environments

technical_functions.name: Container Status Tracking
technical_functions.description: Real-time tracking of container location, orientation, and securing status
technical_functions.success_criteria: Track container status with 99% accuracy throughout handling operations

technical_functions.name: Multi-Sensor Collision Avoidance
technical_functions.description: Advanced collision avoidance using LiDAR, cameras, and radar sensor fusion
technical_functions.success_criteria: Detect and avoid obstacles and humans within 50m range with <200ms response time
technical_functions.tmos: Comprehensive collision avoidance for port safety

technical_functions.name: Human Detection and Tracking
technical_functions.description: Specialized system for detecting and tracking humans in port environment
technical_functions.success_criteria: Detect humans within 25m safety buffer with 99.9% accuracy in all weather conditions
